title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 80.104 - Treatment program
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 80.104 - Treatment program

State Regulations

Persons conducting treatment programs pursuant to article 23 of the Mental Hygiene Law shall keep records required by section
3352
of the Public Health Law and submit a monthly methadone usage report on a form furnished by the department. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
80.104

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
